string.text: A detailed map of the Dead City including mercenary positions
A map of the Dead City
The Doctor's key to a secret stash in Pripyat
Detailed information about the activities of mercenaries in recent months

Protective suit. Weight - 18kg. Details: protects the body from "jelly", "burning fluff", most anomalies and mechanical damage. The chest and back are protected by built-in bio-metallic plates. The suit is equipped with an airtight reinforced plastic helmet and two oxygen containers. Important: during extended periods of use the suit deteriorates beyond use by tearing and disintegration.

Protective Suit. Weight - 8 kg. Details: protects the body from weak anomalies and mechanical damage. Equipped with an oxygen mask. Important: during extended periods of use the suit deteriorates beyond use by tearing and disintegration.

Protective suit. Weight - 12 kg. Details: protects the body from "jelly", "burning fluff", many anomalies and mechanical damage. Equipped with an airtight helmet and an oxygen container. Important: during extended periods of use the suit deteriorates beyond use by tearing and disintegration.

Red SCAPE suit with an airtight helmet. Weight - 11 kg. Details: protects the body from fire, acids, gasses, various anomalies, "burning fluff" and mechanical damage. Equipped with two oxygen containers. Equipped with an airtight helmet and an oxygen container. Important: during extended periods of use the suit deteriorates beyond use by tearing and disintegration.
A device for detecting anomaly fields and disturbances. Notifies of their presence by means of a sound. Needs to be fitted to the belt and activated to work.
Personal digital assistant - indispensable in the Zone.
Torch with a relatively powerful lamp. Quite useful in areas with insufficient light.
Torch with a relatively powerful lamp. Battery charging time has been reduced thanks to a modernised transformer.
"Non-Stop" is an excellent energy drink. Contains caffeine, taurin and a powerful set of vitamins that rejuvenate and provide energy. If you can't take another step it's just the ticket!
Nobody knows who manages to bake loaves in the Zone but the bread isn't contaminated and is perfectly edible. At least none of the stalkers have complained about it.
Canned food from an army warehouse raided by stalkers. The best-before period hasn't expired by the looks of things.
This sausage, made from a mix of chicken and soya, is, for lack of other options, often a stalker's breakfast, lunch and dinner in one.
GSC Vodka. Goes down easily, significantly reduces the effects of radiation but should be enjoyed in moderation.
Reduce the effects of radiation on the body.
All-purpose med kit. Helps to deal with injuries of different kinds and levels - wounds, burns, poisoning etc.
